subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mets’ R. A. Dickey held Miami to five hits and struck out seven batters in his third shutout of the season as the Mets won for the fifth time in six games.
snippet: The Mets’ R. A. Dickey held Miami to five hits and struck out seven batters in his third shutout of the season as the Mets won for the fifth time in six games.
